lyrics:
101 contributorstranslationsукраїнськаportuguêstürkçeespañolfrançaisenglishdanskdeutschyou should be sad lyricsverse 1
i wanna start this out and say
i gotta get it off my chest my chest
got no anger got no malice
just a little bit of regret regret
know nobody else will tell you
so theres some things i gotta say
gonna jot it down and then get it out
and then ill be on my way

prechorus
no youre not half the man you think that you are
and you cant fill the hole inside of you with money drugs and cars
im so glad i never ever had a baby with you
cause you cant love nothing unless theres something in it for you

oh i feel so sorry i feel so sad
i tried to help you it just made you mad
and i had no warning about who you are

that you would never ever touch me again
wont see your alligator tears
cause know ive had enough of them
you might also likeverse 2
im gonna start this out by saying by saying
i really meant well from the start
take a broken man right in my hands
and then put back all his parts

im so glad i never ever had a baby with you
cause you cant love nothing unless theres something in it for you
